data.title: Portrait of King Frederick III of Denmark (1609
data.meta_description: Prints of Portrait of King Frederick III of Denmark (1609-1670) and Sophie Amalie (1670-1710)
data.text:
Heritage Images Photo Prints and Wall Art

Portrait of King Frederick III of Denmark (1609-1670) and Sophie Amalie (1670-1710)

Portrait of King Frederick III of Denmark (1609-1670) and Sophie Amalie (1670-1710), Duchess of Brunswick-Lü neburg, c1643. Found in the Collection of Skokloster Castle. Heritage Images features heritage image collections. © Fine Art Images / Heritage-Images

Media ID 18266739

Frederick Iii Frederick Iii Of Denmark Skokloster Castle Sophie Amalie

Framed Prints

Experience the rich history of Denmark's royal past with our exquisite Framed Print of King Frederick III and Sophie Amalie. This stunning portrait, taken from the esteemed collection at Skokloster Castle, captures the essence of power and elegance in the 17th century. King Frederick III, ruler of Denmark and Norway from 1648 until his death in 1670, is depicted here with his wife, Sophie Amalie, Duchess of Brunswick-Lüneburg, whom he married in 1643. The intricate details of their opulent attire and the regal atmosphere of the portrait are sure to transport you back in time. Add this beautiful piece to your home or office to inspire awe and spark fascinating conversations.

Photo Prints

Step back in time with our exquisite Media Storehouse Portrait Print of King Frederick III of Denmark (1609-1670) and Sophie Amalie (1670-1710), Duchess of Brunswick-Lüneburg. Captured around 1643, this Heritage Image showcases the regal beauty and elegance of the Danish monarch and his wife, Sophie Amalie. Add a touch of history and sophistication to your home or office with this stunning, museum-quality print. Perfect for collectors, historians, or anyone who appreciates the art and history of the past.

Poster Prints

Bring history to life with our exquisite Media Storehouse Poster Prints. This captivating portrait captures the regal presence of King Frederick III of Denmark (1609-1670) and his consort, Sophie Amalie, Duchess of Brunswick-Lüneburg (1670-1710), as they gracefully pose for the painter in the early 17th century. This high-quality print, sourced from the esteemed collection at Skokloster Castle, is a stunning addition to any home or office, offering a glimpse into the rich history of Denmark and the European aristocracy. Embrace the elegance and grandeur of the past with this beautiful and authentic reproduction.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Discover the rich history of Denmark with our exquisite jigsaw puzzle from Media Storehouse. Featuring the captivating Portrait of King Frederick III of Denmark (1609-1670) and Sophie Amalie (1670-1710), Duchess of Brunswick-Lüneburg, this puzzle brings the past to life. Taken from a historic collection at Skokloster Castle, this puzzle offers a challenging yet rewarding experience for puzzle enthusiasts. Immerse yourself in the intricate details of this stunning painting and add a touch of history to your home.
